review.title: “good learning enviroment”
review.pros: Pros – I learned all aspects of the construction trade and became a skilled carpenter. Good hours no weekend work. Flexible enviroment. Quality is stressed over speed. we aren 't rushed.
review.cons: Cons – Owner can get upset if work is done wrong. I understand that we are i n recession but i haven,t gotten a raise in 2 yearsI guess I am lucky to have a job in this enviroment.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – The owner should spend more time looking for new work. He should give his employees more autonomy. Stop micromanaging everything
